channel.title: Can Whonix be imported into Amazon EC2?
channel.description:
I've tried to modify and convert the image but I barely have any knowledge of linux. Is this even possible without removing essential security features?
I was also thinking if maybe using a [url=https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TransparentProxy]Transparent TOR Proxy[/url] would be easier and result in a smiliar anonymity.

item.title: Can Whonix be imported into Amazon EC2?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: Can Whonix be imported into Amazon EC2?
